message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm looking for a price of $13,500. I'm confident you'll find this a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,500 is already a competitive price for a product of this caliber. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but I am unable to go above $9,500. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
